contentrichtext.text: [[File:Map of Russia - Khabarovsk Krai (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Khabarovsk Krai in Russia]] [[File:Map of Russia - Smolensk Oblast (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Smolensk Oblast in Russia]] '''Vyazemsky District''' is the name of several administrative and municipal districts in [[Russia]]. *[[Vyazemsky District, Khabarovsk Krai]], an administrative<ref name="KhabarovskK_adm">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|kha|adm|list}}</ref> and municipal<ref name="KhabarovskK_munMD">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|kha|munmd|list}}</ref> district of [[Khabarovsk Krai]] *[[Vyazemsky District, Smolensk Oblast]], an administrative<ref name="SmolenskO_adm">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|smo|adm|list}}</ref> and municipal<ref name="SmolenskOVyazemskyD_mun">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|smo|mun|list|vyazemsky}}</ref> district of [[Smolensk Oblast]] ==See also== *[[Vyazemsky (disambiguation)]] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{SIA|Russian districts}}
